video_description: ASUS Eee Pad Slider official Commercial - http://www.netbooknews.com - Meet the ASUS Eee Pad Slider, the best tablet for work and play. Featuring a built-in sliding QWERTY keyboard and USB port, the Slider is a 10.1" AndroidTM 3.2 Honeycomb tablet you won't want to miss. You can download thousands of apps from the AndroidTM Market. The 178° ultra-wide viewing angle IPS display and SRS surround sound technology provide you with an exciting mini-cinema on the go. Stay productive with Polaris® Office® or enjoy vivid internet browsing with full Adobe® Flash® support.
title: ASUS Eee Pad Slider official Commercial
